= Introduction =

This class provides some useful methods to ease working with !KmlObjects in managed code. 

= Details =

The main function WalkKmlDom can be to iterate over any Kml structure, a CallBack is used to delegate a method to be called on each item in the structure. The GetUrl method is to help with resolving URLs within !KmlNetworkLinks.

== Public Delegates ==

{{{
public delegate void CallBack(dynamic kmlObject);
}}}
